author: wn.com
title: S. Korea to push for talks with N. Korea after family reunions: NSC chief (Ministry ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Culture , Sports And Tourism of the Republic of Korea ) South Korea will push for inter-Korean government and red cross talks in the near future after the on-going event of family reunions, Seoul 's security adviser said
